channel.title: [Outdated] I can't buy the game
channel.description: ####What happened? I got an infinite loading screen. After 5 minutes, it finished and said "You were NOT charged: Cannot use Stripe token more than twice. ####What was SUPPOSED to happen? My key is sent to me ####Steps to reproduce: Idk ####Comments:

item.title: [Outdated] I can't buy the game
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
If you were charged, you’d have an email with the key. Sounds like your connection hiccuped (laptop? cell phone? wifi?) - it should take about 1/2 second max.

  1. If you saw the not charged page, there was a reason for not being charged after – what did that reason say? “You were not charged - because…”

  2. Check your email for a Stripe receipt. Your key will be there~

  3. Message me in Discord with your email, if no email receipt.

Read full topic

item.title: [Outdated] I can't buy the game
item.dc:creator: Ashie
item.description:
I was charged. Should I wait for the key and contact Xblade if it doesn’t come in 12 hrs?

Read full topic

item.title: [Outdated] I can't buy the game
item.dc:creator: Rogue
item.description:
So, were you charged? If so, Xblade will probably see they got the payment and give you your keys. If not, just rebuy it, if it is your browser, try using another device. If it is your Stripe account, try PayPal.

Read full topic
